definition: to affix a seal/to stamp (a document)/to sign off on sth

sentences.english: Could someone stamp my frequent kidnapping card?
sentences.chinese: 有人可以給我的綁架集點卡蓋章嗎？

sentences.english: Virtual passports are stamped at each national pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 每個展館都會幫你在虛擬護照上蓋章。

sentences.english: Review construction plans, and sign or seal after approval.
sentences.chinese: 一查覈施工計畫書，並於認可後簽名或蓋章。

sentences.english: If a unit has a chief accountant, it must also be signed and stamped by the chief accountant.
sentences.chinese: 設置總會計師的單位，還須由總會計師簽名並蓋章。

sentences.english: Please return your stamped Discharge Notice to the Nurse Station.
sentences.chinese: 請您將辦妥並蓋章之出院通知單繳回護理站。

sentences.english: Some urologists had acquired stamps to apply their signature on Viagra prescriptions. Dr.
sentences.chinese: 一些泌尿科醫生已經使用蓋章來替代偉哥處方的簽名。

sentences.english: The recipients shall sign or affix their seals to the list of returned distraint.
sentences.chinese: 領取人應當在返還款物清單上簽名或者蓋章。

sentences.english: The court record shall be signed or sealed by the parties and other participants in the proceedings.
sentences.chinese: 法庭筆錄由當事人和其他訴訟參與人簽名或者蓋章。

sentences.english: If there is any witness present, the witness may be asked for affixing his signature or seal.
sentences.chinese: 有見證人在場的，可以請見證人簽名或者蓋章。

sentences.english: After the parties acknowledge that the record is free of error, they shall sign or affix their seals to it.
sentences.chinese: 當事人承認沒有錯誤後，應當簽名或者蓋章。

sentences.english: Seven, the A and B since the two sides signed an agreement sealed or date.
sentences.chinese: 本協議自甲乙雙方簽字或蓋章之日起生效。

sentences.english: Zhang Fei stamped toward Dong Zhuo's tent, holding firmly a sharp sword.
sentences.chinese: 張飛蓋章的帳篷，董卓朝持有堅決一把利刃。

sentences.english: The pre-schooler stamps by the parents unit.
sentences.chinese: 學齡前兒童由父母單位蓋章。

sentences.english: Refusal to do so shall be put on record in the case file.
sentences.chinese: 拒絕簽名蓋章的，記明情況附卷。

sentences.english: This Agreement shall take effect upon being signed or stamped by both parties or their authorized representatives.
sentences.chinese: 本協議自雙方授權代表簽字或蓋章之日起生效。

sentences.english: The ticket has to be stamped by the airline to validate it.
sentences.chinese: 須經航空公司蓋章，該機票才能生效。

definition: Mainland Travel Permit for Taiwan Residents/Taiwan Compatriot Entry Permit/abbr. for 台灣居民來往大陸通行證|台湾居民来往大陆通行证[Tai2 wan1 Ju1 min2 Lai2 wang3 Da4 lu4 Tong1 xing2 zheng4]
to act for sb else/to act on sb's behalf/an agent/a diplomatic representative/a chargé d'affaires
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
a pass (authority to enter)/a laissez-passer or safe conduct
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
